image.description: The image the container will use, name:[version] (e.g: ubuntu:16.04.).

container.description:
The name of the container. Must:
- be between 1 and 63 characters long
- be made up exclusively of letters, numbers and dashes from the ASCII table
- not start with a digit or a dash
- not end with a dash

network.description: Network name to add to the container (see incus.network).

storage.description:
Storage name where to store the container, [default_storage] by
default.

profile.description: Profile to set this container up.

config.description: Config key/value to apply to the new instance.

ephemeral.description: If true, the container will be deleted when stopped.

vm.description: If true, instantiate a VM instead of a container.

target.description: If the LXC is clustered, instantiate the container on a specific node.
